talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>I hope that the <clr:0000>schema stone<clr:ffff> I have
provided is useful to you.
talk_0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Welcome. <sp:5:0:0>This was once a busy
refinery where a great deal of zonaite
was processed.<sp:0:4:0>My task here is to manage designs for
mining equipment.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Notice_01>Please hold one moment.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I have confirmed that there is a <clr:0000>schema
stone<clr:ffff> you do not yet have. <sp:5:0:0>Allow me to
rectify that.
talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00><clr:0000>Schema stones<clr:ffff> can immediately produce
the assembled product they depict.<sp:0:4:0>Autobuild <sp:5:0:0>can reproduce products you
have previously assembled.<sp:0:4:0>This previous assembly is not required if
you have a <clr:0000>schema stone<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>These designs are not included in the
amount you can register as favorites.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000>My associates<clr:ffff> have more <clr:0000>schema stones<clr:ffff>.
I recommend taking the time to visit other
abandoned mines.
talk_0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Welcome. This was once a busy
refinery where a great deal of zonaite
was processed.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_01>I <clr:0000>have something for you<clr:ffff>. But I do not
think you are ready to receive it.<sp:0:4:0>Please visit the <clr:0000>Great Abandoned Central
Mine<clr:ffff> and return here afterward.
talk_0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_01>Welcome. I have confirmed that there is a
<clr:0000>schema stone<clr:ffff> you do not yet have. <sp:5:0:0>Allow
me to rectify that.
talk_0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_01>Welcome. I <clr:0000>have something for you<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>But I
do not think you are ready to receive it.<sp:0:4:0>Please visit the <clr:0000>Great Abandoned Central
Mine<clr:ffff> and return here afterward.
talk_0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal>Shall I explain <clr:0000>schema stones<clr:ffff> to you?<sp:0:4:0>Or would you like me to explain what
happens when you use Autobuild with
insufficient parts?
talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:WorkHeavy>This was once a busy refinery where a
great deal of zonaite was processed.<sp:0:4:0>It is all but abandoned now.<sp:0:4:0>I do still have associates here who
process ore and manage schema stones.
You should speak to them.
talk_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Thank you for driving out the trespassers.<sp:0:4:0>I overheard your conversation. You spoke
loudly enough that it was difficult not to.<sp:5:0:0>
talk_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:TalkPositive_01>The Eastern Abandoned Mine that man
spoke of is most likely the <clr:0000>Abandoned
Lanayru Mine<clr:ffff>.
It is extremely far from here. <sp:5:0:0>You will not
find stone guideposts to it in this area.<sp:0:4:0>I suggest ascending to the surface first.
You may be able to find a chasm leading
there in the region to the east.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>There are <clr:0000>two chasms in the region to
the east<clr:ffff> that contain stone guideposts
leading to the Abandoned Lanayru Mine.
I recall a <clr:0000>chasm <clr:ffff>on land in the <clr:0000>Lanayru
Wetlands<clr:ffff>. There is also one south of there
in a <clr:0000>mountain village<clr:ffff>.
talk_1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_00>There is one other thing before you
resume your journey.<sp:5:0:0>
talk_0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>I will also prepare the parts required to
test it via Autobuild.
talk_1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Think_00>My associate over there manages
schema stones. <sp:5:0:0>You may want to ask
for one.
talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think>I <clr:0000>have something for you<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>But I do not
think you are ready to receive it.<sp:0:4:0>Please visit the <clr:0000>Great Abandoned Central
Mine<clr:ffff> and return here afterward.
talk_0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_01>I am curious about one other thing.<sp:0:4:0>Do you know what Autobuild will do if
you <clr:0000>have insufficient parts<clr:ffff>?
talk_1007: <sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Hello. It is nice to see you.<sp:5:0:0>
talk_0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:WorkHeavy>Autobuild will not be able to manufacture
an object if any of its component parts
are missing.<sp:0:4:0>But <clr:0000>zonaite<clr:ffff> can help with this.<sp:0:4:0>You can supplement missing parts
by using <clr:0000>zonaite<clr:ffff> to mimic their form
and properties.<sp:0:4:0>Keep in mind that they are temporary
parts created by the Autobuild ability.<sp:0:4:0>You cannot use them for other purposes.
They will vanish when you disassemble
the creation they were intended for.<sp:0:4:0>I assure you that they are useful despite
these limitations.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>I hope that you find your own purpose
for them.
talk_0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>Excellent.<sp:0:4:0>Then please put the <clr:0000>schema stone<clr:ffff> I gave
you to good use.
